attributes.action: Consider  ways of reducing the financial burden on the young.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young people are bearing a financial burden which includes:student loans (south of the border) , the cost of housing , the entry rate of stamp duty starting at £125,000 and the fact that they will have to work much longer than their parents and have to contribute more for pensions. It's just as well that many young people are indifferent to politics as there are good reasons for social unrest. Are our young people being treated fairly ?
